snippet: Islamists, who in the past week have destroyed and desecrated the tombs of Muslim saints in the fabled town of Timbuktu, are threatening West Africa’s stability.
abstract: Op-Ed article by Benjamin F Soares, senior researcher at the African Studies Centre, warns that Islamists in Mali, who have destroyed and desecrated the tombs of Muslim saints in Timbuktu, are threatening West Africa's stability; contends that it would be a mistake for the United States and Europe to let the problems in Mali fester.
lead_paragraph: Islamists, who in the past week have destroyed and desecrated the tombs of Muslim saints in the fabled town of Timbuktu, are threatening West Africa’s stability.
